Principali attività e responsabilità
Developer c# in SPACE .Net conversion team
SPACE .Net is the go-forward, next version of the existing Visual SPACE
application.
The existing version of this application, the Visual SPACE, uses Microsoft Visual
Basic 6.0 technology.
The purpose of the application is to assist various customers (e.g. Metallurgica
Legnanese, Servotecnica, Sinterplast, etc.) by providing complex ERP
(Enterprise resource planning) functionalities for a large variety of domains
(administration and finance, sales and supply chain, production, project
management and installations maintenance).
My job consist into translate from vb6 to c# and develop new functionality in
Cooperation with a team in Romania  .
